title: Gold Medal plans Thailand mega fam
text:
Gold Medal plans Thailand mega fam 21 July 2015 Save 
Gold Medal is planning on taking 36 agents to Thailand on its latest mega fam. 
Partnering up with the Tourism Authority of Thailand, Centara Hotels & Resorts, Etihad Airways and Bangkok Airways, the trip later this year will see the agents split into four groups. 
Hosted by Gold Medal sales development managers, they will visit four different areas of the country: Phuket, Koh Samui, Chiang Mai and Hua Hin. 
They will then meet again in Bangkok where they will share their experiences at the Access All Areas conference, giving each of the groups the opportunity to share the knowledge with everyone else. 
A total of nine agents will be chosen for the trip from the four various regions of the UK and invites will be split between different categories, including the top-selling agents overall, top-selling Thailand agents, most improved Gold Medal performance overall year-on-year and most improved Thailand performance year-on-year. 
Gold Medal’s national account manager Tina Hodge said: “We want to ensure there is a diverse range of experiences for our agents so they can learn as much as possible to take back to their agencies and help them sell our long-haul destinations. 
“Thailand fits the bill perfectly. From the cultural north, to the island beaches topped off with the vibrant city of Bangkok - the four groups will have so much to share, they’ll be Thailand experts by the end of the trip.”
